name: bignum
description: 128 and 256 bits integer and fixed point arithmetics. Also support checking overflow/underflow
author: MaxGraey <maxgraey@gmail.com>

scripts.build:debug: npx asc assembly/index.ts -b build/debug/bignum.wasm -t build/debug/bignum.wat --debug --sourceMap --validate --runtime stub
scripts.build:release: npx asc assembly/index.ts -b build/release/bignum.wasm -t build/release/bignum.wat -O3 --sourceMap --validate --runtime stub
scripts.build:wasm: yarn run build:debug && yarn run build:release
